sentence.Network_en: Tom spoke unrealistically of getting a full-time job that paid an enormous sum.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆不切实际地谈到要找一份高薪的全职工作。

sentence.Network_en: Stopped players moving back into onside positions at unrealistically fast speed.
sentence.Network_cn: 消灭了球员会以光速往回跑到不越位的位置的情况.

sentence.Network_en: We do not be disheartened , cannot be unrealistically optimistic either.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们既不要悲观失望, 也不能盲目乐观.

PerfectNetExp.abs: unrealistically or naively optimistic .不实际地或盲目乐观的。
his expectaions were unrealistically high ., 他的期望太高 , 很不切实际.
return on investment promotion also somewhat unrealistically ., 投资回报率的宣传也有点虚高.

entry.tran: 不切实际的；不可能达成的
entry.def: If you say that someone is being unrealistic, you mean that they do not recognize the truth about a situation, especially about the difficulties involved in something they want to achieve.

example.ex: There are many who feel that the players are being completely unrealistic in their demands...
example.tran: 很多人都觉得这些球员的要求是完全不现实的。

example.ex: It would be unrealistic to expect such a process ever to be completed.
example.tran: 想要完成这个步骤是不可能的。

auth_sentence.content: The alarmist claims from decades ago are now unrealistically conservative.
auth_sentence.res_content: The alarmist claims from decades ago are now unrealistically conservative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The alarmist claims from decades ago are now unrealistically conservative.

auth_sentence.content: This is the price you pay for unleashing so many hits so early on the bar may have been set unrealistically high.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is the price you pay for unleashing so many hits so early on the bar may have been set unrealistically high.

auth_sentence.content: Both his fame and his subsequent undoing came about because he was held hostage to those unrealistically high guarantees.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both his fame and his subsequent undoing came about because he was held hostage to those unrealistically high guarantees.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both his fame and his subsequent undoing came about because he was held hostage to those unrealistically high guarantees.
